scripts.precompile: inprint && ycplmon2 fix src && eslint src --fix --quiet
scripts.build:cjs: npm run clean:cjs && babel src --config-file ./babel.cjs.config.cjs --out-dir lib/cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps && node cjs_require.test.cjs && echo cjs require is ok!
scripts.watch:cjs: npm run clean:cjs && babel src --config-file ./babel.cjs.config.cjs --out-dir lib/cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps -w
scripts.build:esm: npm run clean:esm && babel src --config-file ./babel.esm.config.cjs --out-dir lib/esm --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps && node mjs_import.test.mjs && echo mjs import is ok!
scripts.watch:esm: npm run clean:esm && babel src --config-file ./babel.esm.config.cjs --out-dir lib/esm --extensions ".ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx" --source-maps -w
scripts.build:docs: api-extractor run --local && api-documenter markdown --input-folder temp --output-folder docs
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf dist/* && yb clean_all && npm run clear:docs
scripts.build: npm run precompile_full && npm run clean:all && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types && npm run build:docs && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.test_module: node cjs_require.test.cjs && node mjs_import.test.mjs && echo ok
scripts.republish: npm run build && npx version-select && npx genversion --es6 --semi version.js && npm publish
scripts.deps: echo Finding loops in .js requires... & del deps.png & madge dist -c -i deps.png && deps.png
scripts.deps_all: echo Generating full .js requires tree... & del deps.png & madge dist -i deps.png && deps.png
scripts.deps_orphans: echo Finding orphans .js requires... & del deps.png & madge dist --orphans -i deps.png && deps.png
